references.reason: This paper is seminal in the field of AI game playing, detailing the development and success of the Deep Blue chess-playing system.

references.paper_title: A Survey of Monte Carlo Tree Search Methods
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS), a crucial algorithm used in many state-of-the-art game-playing AI systems.

references.paper_title: Human-level control through deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper details the groundbreaking DeepMind work on using deep reinforcement learning to achieve human-level performance in video games, a major advance in AI.

references.paper_title: An experiment in automatic game design
references.reason: This paper is one of the earliest works in automated game design and is foundational to much later work in the field.

references.paper_title: Quality diversity: A new frontier for evolutionary computation
references.reason: This paper introduces quality diversity, a crucial concept in evolutionary computation that underpins the novel approach to game generation in this paper.
